page.shortlink: api sql namespace localdb object create instance function

argument.name: InstanceName
argument.description: The name of the SQLLocalDB instance to create.

page.example:
r = sql::localdb::CreateInstance("foo") ?r.text = "Success"
dim instances as c r = sql::localdb::ListInstances(instances) ?r.text = "Success"
?instances = foo MSSQLLocalDB v11.0
